lyrics.stanza: Blest be the tie that binds Our hearts in Christian love; The fellowship our spirit finds Is like to that above.
When we asunder part, It gives us inward pain; But we shall still be joined in heart, And hope to meet again.
From sorrow, toil, and pain, And sin we shall be free; And perfect love and oneness reign Through all eternity.
